</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> When MFD is using user controllers, this command can set values on them. For example, MFD config for Blackfoot has an entry
<ext><name>syntaxhighlight</name><attr> lang=cpp</attr><inner>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - an vehicle with MFD </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Blackfoot [[setUserMFDValue]] [3, 1]; // "user3" - 1</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Set MFD pale Blue:<code>Blackfoot [[setUserMFDValue]] [0, 0]; // "user0" - 0
